item.title: Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a savvy and enthusiastic talent familiar with social media platforms, especially Instagram and TikTok. This hands-on role involves developing content strategies for various brands (cosmetics, restaurants, service providers), shooting and editing reels using mobile phones or cameras with CapCut or other editing software, and contributing to graphic design or providing creative visual insights. Familiarity with Instagram and TikTok, proficiency in video shooting and editing, and basic graphic design skills or a strong eye for visuals are preferred. Living in Southern California is preferred.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$40.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 08:56 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:TikTok Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instagram Reels, CapCut, Content Creation
Skills: TikTok Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instagram Reels, CapCut, Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
